fields.request: Validate screen Admin Pending TODOs widget
fields.request_details:
1. Sign into the Django admin while no Release Manager TODOs are pending and open /admin/. Confirm the Pending TODOs widget renders with the empty-state message and the View all tasks link.
2. Create or reopen a Release Manager TODO and refresh /admin/. Verify the widget lists the task with working Check and Config links.
3. Complete the TODO and reload the dashboard to ensure the widget returns to the empty-state message without disappearing.
